Notes.Text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-50420: Fixed Denial of Service in pdfseparate utility (bsc#1247590)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue in the pdfseparate utility of freedesktop poppler v25.04.0 allows attackers to cause an infinite recursion via supplying a crafted PDF file. This can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).
